abstract: New York Red Bulls will host MLS Cup final at Red Bull Arena if they can erase two-goal deficit to Columbus Crew in upcoming playoff game.
lead_paragraph: If the club manages to erase its two-goal deficit to the Columbus Crew, it will host the M.L.S. Cup final at Red Bull Arena.

headline.main: Red Bulls’ Home Edge Faces Stiff Test
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls’ Home Edge Faces Stiff Test

snippet: If the club manages to erase its two-goal deficit to the Columbus Crew, it will host the M.L.S. Cup final at Red Bull Arena.
